251 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXform
252 {
253 public:
254  CIccXform();
255  virtual ~CIccXform();
256 
257  virtual icXformType GetXformType() const = 0;
258 
260  static CIccXform *Create(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput=true, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
261  icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
262  bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
263 
266  static CIccXform *Create(CIccProfile &pProfile, bool bInput=true, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
267  icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
268  bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
269 
270  virtual icStatusCMM Begin();
271 
272  virtual CIccApplyXform *GetNewApply(icStatusCMM &status);
273 
274  virtual void Apply(CIccApplyXform *pXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const = 0;
275 
276  //Detach and remove CIccIO object associated with xform's profile. Must call after Begin()
277  virtual bool RemoveIO() { return m_pProfile->Detach(); }
278 
280  virtual icColorSpaceSignature GetSrcSpace() const;
281 
283  virtual icColorSpaceSignature GetDstSpace() const;
284 
286  virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return false; }
288  virtual bool IsVersion2() const { return !m_pProfile || m_pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV4; }
289 
291  bool IsInput() const { return m_bInput; }
292 
294  void SetParams(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput, icRenderingIntent nIntent, icXformInterp nInterp, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
295 
297  virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractInputCurves()=0;
298  virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractOutputCurves()=0;
299 
300  virtual bool NoClipPCS() const { return false; }
301 
303  const CIccProfile* GetProfile() const { return m_pProfile; }
304 
306  icRenderingIntent GetIntent() const { return m_nIntent; }
307 
308 protected:
309  //Called by derived classes to initialize Base
310 
311  const icFloatNumber *CheckSrcAbs(CIccApplyXform *pApply, const icFloatNumber *Pixel) const;
312  void CheckDstAbs(icFloatNumber *Pixel) const;
313  void AdjustPCS(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const;
314 
315  virtual bool HasPerceptualHandling() { return true; }
316 
317  CIccProfile *m_pProfile;
318  bool m_bInput;
319  icRenderingIntent m_nIntent;
320  icXYZNumber m_MediaXYZ;
321  icXformInterp m_nInterp;
322 
323  // track PCS adjustments
324  IIccAdjustPCSXform* m_pAdjustPCS;
325  bool m_bAdjustPCS;
326  icFloatNumber m_PCSScale[3]; // scale and offset for PCS adjustment in XYZ
327  icFloatNumber m_PCSOffset[3];
328 };

614 
616  icApplyInterface GetInterface() const {return m_nApplyInterface;}
617 
618  virtual void Apply(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const {}
619 
620  icStatusCMM Apply(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform, icChar *DstColorName, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const;

622 
623  virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return m_pTag->UseLegacyPCS(); }
624 
625  icStatusCMM SetSrcSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace);
626  icStatusCMM SetDestSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace);
627 
629  icColorSpaceSignature GetSrcSpace() const { return m_nSrcSpace; }
631  icColorSpaceSignature GetDstSpace() const { return m_nDestSpace; }
632 
634  bool IsSrcPCS() const {return m_nSrcSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();}
636  bool IsDestPCS() const {return m_nDestSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();}
637 
638

642 protected:

645

647  icApplyInterface m_nApplyInterface;

649  icColorSpaceSignature m_nDestSpace;

843 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccCmm
844 {
845  friend class CIccApplyCmm;
846 public:
847  CIccCmm(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace=icSigUnknownData,
848  icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace=icSigUnknownData,
849  bool bFirstInput=true);
850  virtual ~CIccCmm();
851 
852  virtual CIccPCS *GetPCS() { return new CIccPCS(); }
853 
855  virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(const icChar *szProfilePath, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
856  icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
857  bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
858  virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(icUInt8Number *pProfileMem, icUInt32Number nProfileLen,
859  icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent, icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear,
860  icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor, bool bUseMpeTags=true,
861  CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
862  virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(CIccProfile *pProfile, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
863  icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
864  bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL); //Note: profile will be owned by the CMM
865  virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(CIccProfile &Profile, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
866  icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
867  bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL); //Note the profile will be copied
868 
869  //The Begin function should be called before Apply or GetNewApplyCmm()
870  virtual icStatusCMM Begin(bool bAllocNewApply=true);
871 
872  //Get an additional Apply cmm object to apply pixels with. The Apply object should be deleted by the caller.
873  virtual CIccApplyCmm *GetNewApplyCmm(icStatusCMM &status);
874 
875  virtual CIccApplyCmm *GetApply() { return m_pApply; }
876 
877  //The following apply functions should only be called if using Begin(true);
878  virtual icStatusCMM Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel);
879  virtual icStatusCMM Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icUInt32Number nPixels);
880 
881  //Call to Detach and remove all pending IO objects attached to the profiles used by the CMM. Should be called only after Begin()
882  virtual icStatusCMM RemoveAllIO();
883 
885  virtual icUInt32Number GetNumXforms() const;
886 
888  icColorSpaceSignature GetSourceSpace() const { return m_nSrcSpace; }
890  icColorSpaceSignature GetDestSpace() const { return m_nDestSpace; }
892  icColorSpaceSignature GetLastSpace() const { return m_nLastSpace; }
894  icRenderingIntent GetLastIntent() const { return m_nLastIntent; }
895 
897  icUInt16Number GetSourceSamples() const {return (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_nSrcSpace);}
899  icUInt16Number GetDestSamples() const {return (icUInt16Number)icGetSpaceSamples(m_nDestSpace);}
900 
902  bool Valid() const { return m_bValid; }
903 
904  //Function to convert check if Internal representation of 'gamt' color is in gamut.
905  static bool IsInGamut(icFloatNumber *pData);
906
